SEARCH

Package aor.fpbackend.utils

package aor.fpbackend.utils
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    EmailService
    EmailService is a stateless EJB that provides methods for sending various types of emails, such as confirmation emails, password reset emails, project invitations, and join requisitions.
    GlobalSettings
    GlobalSettings holds the application-wide constants used for configuration and default values.
    GsonSetup
    GsonSetup provides a customized Gson instance with adapters for Java 8 date and time types.
    InstantAdapter
    InstantAdapter is a custom serializer and deserializer for Instant objects.
    JacksonObjectMapperProvider
    JacksonObjectMapperProvider is a context resolver for configuring Jackson's ObjectMapper.
    JwtKeyProvider
    JwtKeyProvider provides a singleton Key instance for JWT signing and verification.
    LocalDateAdapter
    LocalDateAdapter is a custom serializer and deserializer for LocalDate objects to and from JSON using the Gson library.
    LocalDateTimeAdapter
    LocalDateTimeAdapter is a custom serializer and deserializer for LocalDateTime objects to and from JSON using the Gson library.
    ObjectMapperConfigurator
    ObjectMapperConfigurator provides a method to configure a Jackson ObjectMapper with support for Java 8 Date/Time API and to serialize dates as ISO strings.
    PassEncoder
    PassEncoder is a stateless EJB that provides methods for encoding passwords and verifying password matches using the BCrypt hashing algorithm.
    PdfGenerator
    PdfGenerator is a stateless EJB that provides methods for generating PDF reports for project and asset summaries using Apache PDFBox.
